about_the_game:
Lisa loves the laid-back life in countryside villages so much that she even took agriculture classes in college. When she heard that there's a new program to repopulate a village that will provide those who come with some land, she immediately jumped at the opportunity. Her friend Honoka even decided to join her to keep her company! Join them as they plant crops, raise animals, interact with the villagers, and grow their little slice of village life into something to be proud of.

Play as Lisa, a farming enthusiast in a soothing adventure, where you raise your own farm, including various vegetation, fungiculture, raising animals, and even catching fishes!

Collect materials to craft and upgrade your tools, gather ingredients to cook delicious meals, and go fishing at the lake! Explore the village and interact with villagers, who might even help you with the farm. And when everything is done for the day, your cute girlfriend just might have a reward for you~

Hoard of items

The game features a wide variety of items to collect, including (but certainly not limited to) vegetables, fruits, minerals, fishes, mushrooms, and even animals!

Game modes

The game offers three different modes for different types of players!

- Cheater (Easy mode)
- Casual (Normal mode)
- Slow Grind (Farming veterans)

Be your own designer!

Craft, build, and design your very own mega farm! The game allows you to design the farm area, including building animal sheds and customizing the farmland.

Lisa loves the laid-back life in countryside villages so much that she even took agriculture classes in college. name: Dream Life in the Country Side

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A laid-back farming simulator where you play as Lisa, a dedicated farmer by day and a passionate partner of Honoka at night. Work the land, raise animals, and cultivate your relationship. Unlock special scenes as your bond and farm flourish.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, French, German
*languages with full audio support
